Reviews.Title: The best value for money
Reviews.Author: Daniel Omar Pereira G
Reviews.Content: Acquired this kit for our new Nikon camera and the results were excellent, the batteries were recognized without problems the camera, and the card reader, mini tripod, and screen protector are an essential supplement for this camera, received in Colombia , South America on time ...

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The products so far work excellent.  I am writing this mainly because the DavisMax bent over backward and corrected the glitch we had in the package of items.  This is a little quick to write a review for the quality of the products, but as now (3 weeks) they are still going strong and have not failed me.

Reviews.Title: Extra Batteries, Charger, etc
Reviews.Author: South Florida
Reviews.Content: The charger I received was defective and the shipper was kind enough to replace it and not make me pay postage to return the defective one.  This is an example of how to do business and earn trust.  Everything now is fine.

Reviews.Title: Very good deal
Reviews.Author: Tom Wayburn
Reviews.Content: Excellent bargain.  Many useful and instructive objects.  The storage disk holder made me realize that storage disks are a viable repository of photos as opposed to the hard disks in our compute, thus saving the trouble of downloading photos.

Reviews.Title: Spend More
Reviews.Author: tnywes
Reviews.Content: Quality of items poor. Screen saver is a joke. Not designed to give smooth coverage. Will try batteries for while and see how they fare.

Reviews.Title: Great procuct, great price
Reviews.Author: Georgie
Reviews.Content: I was going to purchase this bundle at a store nearby and theirs had a couple less items in it and it was more expensive, I got this bundle and its great and you can't beat the price

Reviews.Title: one batery no proforming right
Reviews.Author: charles ryan
Reviews.Content: all was well. till one of the batteries would not recharge on the second day. all else fine. the package came in the two day window. That was nice.
